vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A woman of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, only mentioned at 1Ch.4.3;
daughter of: Hur (H2354);
sister of: Uri (H0221), Shobal (H7732H), Salma (H8007H), Hareph (H2780), Jezreel (H3157J), Ishma (H3457), Idbash (H3031), Penuel (H6439H) and Ezer (H5829)
§ Hazelelponi = "facing the shade"
sister of the sons of Etam in the genealogies of Judah
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
哈悉勒玻尼 这个陰性專有名詞 人名在希伯來文的意思是 "面對陰暗"
以坦之子的妹子, 屬猶大支派血統 #代上 4:3|
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
哈悉勒玻尼 这个阴性专有名词 人名在希伯来文的意思是 "面对阴暗"
以坦之子的妹子, 属犹大支派血统 #代上 4:3|
